DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , longitudinal , 5-year study enroll participant exist Cystic Fibrosis Foundation ( CFF ) patient registry . Each enrol participant provide sample microbiological evaluation , obtain upon enrollment per year thereafter 5 year .
DOC.brief_title: Registry Monitor Susceptibility Aztreonam Pseudomonas Aeruginosa Isolates From Cystic Fibrosis Patients
DOC.criteria: Key Subjects must meet follow inclusion criterion eligible participation study . Current participant willingness participate CFF patient registry database ≥ 6 year age Subject CF diagnose one follow Documented sweat chloride ≥ 60 mEq/L quantitative pilocarpine iontophoresis test , Two wellcharacterized genetic mutation CFTR gene , Abnormal nasal potential difference ( NPD ) AND accompany clinical characteristic consistent CF . For subject lack documentation either positive sweat chloride test abnormal NPD , one wellcharacterized genetic mutation CFTR gene , diagnosis CF determine Investigator . FEV1 ≥ 25 % predict ≤ 90 % predict . ≥ 2 low respiratory tract culture positive PA result document subject 's medical history . Subject must able provide write informed consent/assent prior study related procedure ; parent/guardian must able give write informed consent necessary prior study related procedure . Key Subjects meet follow exclusion criterion enrol study . • Any serious active medical psychiatric illness , opinion Investigator , would interfere subject assessment . Note : Other protocol define Inclusion/Exclusion criterion may apply .
